mapper.sql: a.item_id as itemId, a.order_id as orderId, a.goods_id as goodsId, a.sku_id as skuId, a.sku_property as skuProperty, a.num_id as numId, a.num as num, a.is_shipment as isShipment, a.seller_id as sellerId, a.seller_name as sellerName, a.shipment_api as shipmentApi, a.companystock_id as companystockId, a.quantity as quantity, a.price as price, a.total as total, a.meal_id as mealId, a.iccid as iccid
mapper.select:
select
from tb_order_item a where a.id = #{id};
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_order_item( item_id, p_item_id, order_id, goods_id, sku_id, sku_property, num_id, num, is_shipment, seller_id, seller_name, shipment_api, companystock_id, quantity, price, total, meal_id, iccid ) values
( #{orderItem.itemId}, #{orderItem.pItemId}, #{orderItem.orderId}, #{orderItem.goodsId}, #{orderItem.skuId}, #{orderItem.skuProperty}, #{orderItem.numId}, #{orderItem.num}, #{orderItem.isShipment}, #{orderItem.sellerId}, #{orderItem.sellerName}, #{orderItem.shipmentApi}, #{orderItem.companystockId}, #{orderItem.quantity}, #{orderItem.price}, #{orderItem.total}, #{orderItem.mealId}, #{orderItem.iccid} )
mapper.select: select n.id, n.`status` from tb_order_item oi, tb_num n where oi.num_id = n.id and oi.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: update tb_order_item oi set oi.meal_id = #{mealId} where oi.order_id = #{orderId}
